content:
Citat:
 20 years have passed since the moment when a former traffic policeman, Sergei Torop, decided to live in the taiga and create a new religion. Today, his Church of the Last Testament has several thousand followers who live in the villages of the Kuragino Region, and everyone in the Krasnoyarsk Territory heard of Vissarion (this is how the latter-day prophet calls himself).
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	

 
	

 

Evo, še brunarce so za naredit:

 
	

 

Sometimes though the God himself goes down the mountain in his snow-white “Land Cruiser” to get closer to his people:

 
	

 

Pa še inernet imajo.
author: veselilisjak
